name: Factory Flight
description:
In a long since abandoned factory, an unfinished robot powers on. With nothing else to guide it, they have two objectives: Complete their metallic body, and escape.

This game was created for the game jam "Indie Game Dev Beginners #003" under the theme of Robots over the course of five days. Features four levels and a boss fight.

Move with WASD keys, jump with [SPACE], and control other actions with the shift key and mouse buttons, should you find parts that use them. And of course, press [P] to pause and hold [ESC] to quit.
